Name: Simultaneous Control
About the game: In this game you need to control two characters, where one has normal movement control, and the other character has inverted movement control. Try to control both characters with different motion controls, and find the three parts of the key scattered around the game. When you find all the key parts, they will become a single key, and then the gate will be opened in each of the 100 levels available in this game!
